title: Interhaptics SDK
description: Elevate your gaming experience through haptic feedback
longDescription:
Introducing the Interhaptics SDK for Unreal Engine, your gateway to a world of immersive haptic experiences. Elevate your Unreal Engine projects with the Interhaptics SDK and bring a new dimension of touch and feel to your virtual creations.


Platforms:

  • GameInput/XInput PC Controllers
  • PlayStation 5 (must be a PlayStation Partner)
  • Nintendo Switch (must be a Nintendo Developer)


Once the Interhaptics SDK is integrated, you can harness its power through Unreal Engine's Content Browser. Here's how to make the most of it:


Haptic Manager:

Dive into "Interhaptics C++ class > Interhaptics > Public" and find the Haptic Manager. Easily drag it into your Viewport, setting the stage for haptic interactions in your project.


Creating Haptic Blueprints:

Generate new Blueprints with the "Haptic Source" type, and unlock a plethora of haptic features at your fingertips. Customize your experiences with:


  •    General: Assign a Haptic Effect to objects within your project, dictating how they interact with haptic feedback.
  •    Blueprint Event Graph - Set Targets: Define the targets of your haptic source, choosing from Left, Right, Both, or None. Tailor the experience to your specific needs.
  •    Blueprint Event Graph - Play: Initiate haptic events, immersing users in tactile feedback that brings your project to life.
  •    Blueprint Event Graph - Stop: When the time is right, halt ongoing haptic events with ease.


Access Documentation:

For comprehensive guidance and in-depth information on utilizing the Interhaptics SDK for Unreal Engine, consult our official documentation at Interhaptics Unreal SDK Documentation - https://www.interhaptics.com/doc/interhaptics-unreal-sdk/. Here, you'll find all the resources you need to master haptic interactions in your projects.


Unreal In-Engine Testing:

Open the HapticLevel3D map from Interhaptics Content and enter PlayMode to test directly 4 different haptic effects on your controller by pressing the A,B,X,Y buttons. (PC GameInput/XInput controller required)


Haptic Composer:

Create custom HD haptic effect for GameInput/Xinput, PlayStation 5 DualSense, and Nintendo JoyCon Controllers (currently supported by the Interhaptics Unreal SDK) - Download it here https://www.interhaptics.com/download/


Join Our Community:

Should you require assistance, seek guidance, or simply wish to engage in discussions about the exciting realm of haptics, we invite you to join our vibrant community on Discord. Connect with fellow creators, developers, and haptic enthusiasts via the following link: Interhaptics Discord Community - https://discord.com/invite/93jU9nAX4f.

Together, we'll explore the frontiers of touch in the virtual world.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Assign a Haptic Effect to a Haptic Source to be played on GameInput/XInput compatible PC controllers / PS5 DualSense controllers (request on PS5 Dev Portal - must be PlayStation Partner) / Nintendo JoyCon controllers (request on the Nintendo Developer Portal)
  • Set Targets: allows you to set the targets of the haptic source between Left, Right, Both or None (targeting done on the game controller - body, trigger or both zones)
  • Blueprint Event Graph: Play: starts all haptic events related to the Haptic Source
  • Blueprint Event Graph: Stop: stops all haptic events related to the Haptic Source

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  • Interhaptics : Runtime
  • HapticEffect : Runtime
  • ProviderGameInput: Runtime
  • HapticEffectEditor : Editor

Number of Blueprints: 4

Number of C++ Classes: 11

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64, PS5 (through request on PS5 Dev Portal), Nintendo Switch (request on Nintendo Developer Portal)

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64, PS5 (through request on PS5 Dev Portal), Nintendo Switch (request on Nintendo Developer Portal)

Documentation: https://www.interhaptics.com/doc/interhaptics-unreal-sdk

Example Project: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cv47qRv2JX-cXcbDMW5wOPRjtbTNbd0N/view?usp=drive_link

Tutorial : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QE1bG8qpC-Q

Important/Additional Notes: Interhaptics SDK is compatible with all Unreal Engine versions from 4.26 onward
